section.name: ApacheDS Modules
section.p: ApacheDS is composed of several modules. Here is the list of them with brief descriptions:

tr.td: Server's core contains all backend subsystems. It depends on protocol and uses it with seda to service LDAP requests. The core contains the JNDI provider, interceptor framework, interceptor services, the schema subsystem and the database subsystem. Hence the core is the heart of the server.
Created to eliminate cyclic project dependencies between the core and the maven plugin. Any code shared across modules in general can go here so long as it does not depend on other modules.
A collection of tools as plugins to manage various tasks associated with the directory server.
Contained within this executable jar are various commandline utilities for apacheds.
